snippet: The venture capital firm Lux Capital said on Wednesday that it had closed its third fund at $245 million, the biggest pool of capital it has raised to date.
abstract: The venture capital firm Lux Capital said on Wednesday that it had closed its third fund at $245 million, the biggest pool of capital it has raised to date.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Lux Capital Closes 3rd Fund at $245 Million
